duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and lead kaizen projects using lean methodology to improve material flow and inventory accuracy.
Develop and maintain logistics standards for logistics areas.
Work with partner teams to maintain accurate PFEP data and map BOM structure within operating systems.
Design, document, and layout material storage, delivery, and picking processes.
Propose and implement lean manufacturing material flow concepts to improve material availability and inventory accuracy.
Define detailed business requirements, analyze business needs, and propose operational and systems improvements.
Participate in the investigation of material shortage issues, develop process improvements and corrective actions.
Collaborate and communicate with employees at all levels of the organization to achieve plant and department goals.
Monitor work quality, use data to communicate, display commitment to excellence, and complete projects on time and budget.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Supply Chain Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
